title: Spacelift Scales Legacy Automation: Terraform First, Ansible Next
author: Joab Jackson
description: An initial contributor to the OpenTofu fork of HashiCorp Terraform, Spacelift wants to modernize IT workflow automation tools. Next up: Red Hat Ansible.
cntitle: Spacelift 扩展遗留自动化：先 Terraform，再 Ansible
cndescription: 作为HashiCorp Terraform的OpenTofu分支的早期贡献者，Spacelift希望现代化IT工作流自动化工具。接下来是：Red Hat Ansible。
